instructions: Participants rated their own comfort, their friends' comfort, and the average student's comfort. The order of questions (self first vs. average student first) was manipulated.

items.question: How comfortable do you feel with the alcohol drinking habits of students at Princeton?

metadata.original_scale: 11-point scale (1 = not at all comfortable, 11 = very comfortable)

items.question: How comfortable does the average Princeton undergraduate feel with the alcohol drinking habits of students at Princeton?
How comfortable do your friends feel with the alcohol drinking habits of students at Princeton?
